name: Eleri Wynter
motivation: Eager to unlock the secrets of the Eldoria and use their mystical insights to enhance the magical potential of Flevia, particularly interested in reviving ancient healing arts.

name: Thalion Mossfoot
motivation: Driven to protect the Whispering Woods from exploitation, focusing on maintaining the harmony between the natural and magical elements of the land.

name: Sir Gareth Skybound
motivation: Committed to ensuring the safety of Flevia from external threats while seeking to unify its people under a banner of peace and justice.

name: Lady Seraphine Stoneweaver
motivation: Aiming to bridge cultural gaps between the races of Flevia, promoting unity through shared traditions and innovations from recovered Eldorian knowledge.

name: Brigg Ironfoot
motivation: Intends to profit from the relics of the Eldoria while navigating tension with the Seekers, believing their discoveries could revolutionize industry and commerce.
